---
title: "R Notebook for initial analysis of 6 month Amos and Rilka"
output: html_notebook
---
 
```{r}
############## LIBRARIES ++++++++++++++
library(readr) #for reading csv files

library(dplyr)

```
 
 
```{r}
############## LOAD FILES ++++++++++++++

# Load csv files
dat.amos <-
  read_csv("../../dat/Amos_20190613_20200111.csv") %>%  #read raw file
  rename (date_time = 'Date and Time') %>%              #convert character dates to usable date object
  mutate (y.m.d = as.POSIXct(
                substr(date_time,1,8), 
                    format="%m/%d/%y", 
                    tz=Sys.timezone() ) ) %>%           #convert character times to usable time object
  mutate (hour = as.POSIXct( 
                substr(date_time,10,14),              
                    format="%m/%d/%y", 
                    tz=Sys.timezone() ) ))

 


```
